description: A rare complication of traumatic brain injury where ectopic bone forms in soft tissues around joints, compounded by neurogenic inflammation from concomitant brachial plexus traction injury. The condition involves pathological osteogenic differentiation of mesenchymal stem cells triggered by combined neurological and mechanical factors.
